text: Is there anything else that might be triggering the Google font links?

Hey <@U026MMJMU9H> 
Some time Google font loading from default CSS file. like if you are using any default template or paid theme then they have exported the Google font file into default CSS file.

So you have to remove it from there.
I hope it will help you.
Thanks <@U01FH92LP6W>, it's a custom built theme so it's something triggering the 'hs-editor-styles' section rather than a link to Google Fonts anywhere in the stylesheets/templates
Can you share the links or screenshot of it?
Sure! These are the offending items
So are you using this averin font family?
Yes, but it's loaded in as an @font-face file
